name: Django CI



on:
  push:
    branches: [ "master" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "master" ]
env:
  PROJECT_ID: ${{ secrets.HEROKU_API_KEY }}
  APP_ID: app
  RUN_REGION: us-central1 
  IMAGE_NAME: django_pi_v2/app:latest
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      max-parallel: 4
      matrix:
        python-version: [3.9]

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v3
    - name: Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }}
      uses: actions/setup-python@v3
      with:
        python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
    - name: Install Dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt
    - name: Run Tests
      run: |
       python manage.py ./django_pi_v2/test
     
    - name: Docker Compose
      run:  docker-compose up --build -d
        # build image
    - name: Build Docker image
      run: docker build -f $IMAGE_NAME .
  deploy: 
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Login to Heroku container registry
        env:
         HEROKU_API_KEY: ${{secrets.HEROKU_API_KEY}}
        run: heroku container:login
      - name: Build and Push
        env:
         HEROKU_API_KEY: ${{secrets.HEROKU_API_KEY}}
        run: heroku container:push -a $IMAGE_NAME .
      - name: release 
        env:
         HEROKU_API_KEY: ${{secrets.HEROKU_API_KEY}}
        run: heroku container:release -a $IMAGE_NAME .
